translation.en: [Geoffrey] Good morning, Lusaka!
This is Reporter Geoffrey bringing you the Lusaka News!
translation.es: ¡Soy el reportero Geoffrey,con las noticias de Lusaka!

translation.en: While the sun may be shining brightly, last night another mysterious tornado struck.
translation.es: Hoy brilla el sol,pero anoche hubo otro misterioso tornado.

translation.en: Its powerful winds knocked out power for hours.
translation.es: Causó un apagón que duró horas.

translation.en: -Iye, Geoffrey, I know. -[man] Hey, iwe!
Elo, I was busy finishing my project for the Science fair ka.
translation.es: Estaba terminando mi proyecto de ciencias.

translation.en: Geoffrey, do you realize Mr. Magedzee -is going to be there? -[grunts]
translation.es: ¿Sabes que el señor Magedzeeestará en la feria?

translation.en: These tricky twisters were previously unheard of in Zambia, and indeed, Africa.
translation.es: Nunca hubo tornados como estosen Zambia ni en el resto de África.

translation.en: So why are they happening, Geoffrey?
Blackouts from load shedding were bad enough. Now tornados?
[groans] Likando, why did I join the majorettes? It's bad enough being the new kid at school.
translation.es: Likando, ¿por qué me uní a las majorettes?Ser la nueva ya es bastante malo.

translation.en: Ah-ah, Monde. Did you forget you were captain of your old majorette team?
translation.es: Monde, eras la capitana del equipoen tu otra escuela.

translation.en: You've got this, little sis.
These tornados are just another disaster battering Lusaka.
translation.es: Los tornados no son el único problema.

translation.en: With an increase in crime and daily blackouts, the people are calling for Mayor Sikazwe's resignation.
translation.es: Dados los delitos y apagones diarios,piden la renuncia del alcalde Sikazwe.

translation.en: -[chanting] No more blackouts! -Please! No more load shedding!
Sisi, if Mayor Sikazwe gets fired, you could lose your job.
translation.es: Si lo despiden,podrías quedarte sin trabajo.

translation.en: Don't worry about me. I don't plan on being the mayor's assistant for long.
translation.es: No te preocupes. No piensoser su asistente por mucho tiempo.

translation.en: I see much bigger and better things for us soon.
translation.es: Sé que nos espera un futuro mucho mejor.

translation.en: Iwe Monde! Get over here now!
[sighs] Coming, Marjory.
This is Chipo with Kamiji Secondary's very own star player of the fútbol team,
translation.es: Soy Chipo y estoy con la jugadora estrellade la Escuela Secundaria Kamiji,

translation.en: Zikomo Phiri!
Ah-ha!
This is Zee with Kamiji Secondary School's very own Chipo Hamoonga,
translation.es: Soy Zee y estoy aquí con el mismísimoChipo Hamoonga de la Secundaria Kamiji,

translation.en: who is crushing on Komana Mwiinga.
Stop, ekse! -[Zee laughing]
[Temwe] One vitumbuwa. Two vitumbuwa. Who am I kidding?
translation.es: Una vitumbuwa. Dos vitumbuwa.¿A quién quiero engañar?

translation.en: Thank you, Ba Saasa!
-[Mr. Nkwashi] Hey! -Huh? Temwe Chiti! Are you stealing food? Principal Nkwashi, what do you take me for?
translation.es: - ¡Temwe Chiti! ¿Está robando comida?- Director Nkwashi, ¿qué cree que soy?

translation.en: -A delinquent? -Hm.
I've got my eye on you, Chiti. What's the other eye doing?
translation.es: - No le quitaré el ojo de encima, Chiti.- ¿Y qué hará con el otro ojo?

translation.en: [Geoffrey] Lusaka hasn't endured this kind of turmoil in 20 years. Who can keep our city safe?
translation.es: Hacía 20 años que Lusaka no vivíauna crisis como esta. ¿Quién nos ayudará?

translation.en: Mama K's Juice Ya Cheapa!
-T.O.M.I., come online please. -T.O.M.I. here, Mama K.
The threat is growing, T.O.M.I. We need our new team today to keep our people safe!
translation.es: La situación empeora.¡Necesitamos un nuevo equipo!

translation.en: Commencing final footage collection to confirm our candidates.
-Mama K! -[hiccups] Oh!
-Are you all set up? -Oh, yes, Mr. Nkwashi, thank you.
translation.es: ¡Mama K.! ¿Ya está instalada? Sí, señor Nkwashi. Gracias.

translation.en: Um, if you don't mind, I may need to speak to you later about volunteers for my fruit and vegetable stand.
translation.es: Puede que necesite voluntariospara mi puesto de frutas y verduras.

translation.en: Volunteers? Anything to help a member of our little community.
translation.es: ¡Sí! Lo que seapara ayudar a la comunidad.

translation.en: -[slurping] -[Mr. Magedzee] Hello, everybody! Hello, bantu banga. I am Lee Magedzee, owner of Magedzee Power Corporation.
translation.es: ¡Hola a todos! Soy Lee Magedzee,dueño del Corporativo de Energía Magedzee.

translation.en: Thank you for inviting me to Kamiji Secondary School's Science Fair.
translation.es: Gracias por invitarmea la feria de ciencias de Kamiji.

translation.en: At MPC, we are committed to bringing power to the people!
translation.es: ¡El objetivo del CEMes darle energía y poder al pueblo!

translation.en: I am beyond excited to see your inventions
translation.es: Estoy ansioso por ver sus inventos

translation.en: and discover if one of you will be the next recipient of our MPC scholarship!
translation.es: y descubrir si alguno de ustedesrecibirá la beca del CEM.

translation.en: The power to save our world starts with you students.
Yes!
Mr. Magedzee!
[clears throat] I am Komana Mwiinga. I would like to apply for the MPC Scholarship.
translation.es: Soy Komana Mwiinga.Quisiera postularme para la beca.

translation.en: So nice to meet you.
May I present to you my Carbon Capture machine.
Very intriguing. I'm all ears.
Well, the concept is based on--
translation.es: Bueno, el concepto se basa en…

translation.en: Another power station attack. And the tornado is headed here.
translation.es: Otro ataque a la central.¡Y el tornado se acerca!

translation.en: T.O.M.I., focus on the tornado.
translation.es: T.O.M.I., concéntrate en el tornado.Necesito información.

translation.en: -We need to know what is really going on. -[T.O.M.I.] Yes, Mama K.
translation.es: T.O.M.I., concéntrate en el tornado.Necesito información. Sí, Mama K.

translation.en: Attention! Take shelter under the stands! Follow me!
[Ba Saasa] Help! Somebody! I'm trapped.
-[gasps] -Help!
Hey! -Help Mr. Nkwashi. -Huh?
Help me, please!
But Ba Saasa! And the vitumbuwa!
Help!
-Help! -I've got them!
[grunting] May I use this, Gogo?
Ba Saasa, use this!
Help!
-Mr. Nkwashi, pull yourself to safety. -Don't tell me what to do, Chiti!
translation.es: - Sr. Nkwashi, ¡salga de ahí!- ¡No me diga qué hacer, Chiti!

translation.en: But I'm trying to help you! [screams]
Hm. I should have saved the vitumbuwa.
Help! Help!
Help!
-Let's go, Marjory. -Eh! Let's go who?
Let's go, Captain.
-[yells] -I've got you, Chipo!
-Run! -[Chipo yelps]
Gogo, run!
[Geoffrey] A freak tornado ran through the city, striking another power station and wreaking havoc on Kamiji Secondary School.
translation.es: Un tornado azotó otra central eléctricay causó estragos en la Secundaria Kamiji.

translation.en: -Tensions in Lusaka are rising… -[coughing] …with endemic blackouts bringing life to a standstill, and repeated…
translation.es: La tensión aumenta en Lusaka,con apagones endémicos que paralizan…

translation.en: Komana. [coughing]
Here you go, Ta. Use this.
-Catch your breath. -[inhales]
-Are you okay now? -Yes. Thank you.
Mr. Nkwashi just called. You are required to attend a meeting. Are you in trouble?
translation.es: El señor Nkwashi llamó.Tienes una reunión. ¿Estás en problemas?

translation.en: Huh? What? No. Wait. When is this meeting?
Mr. Magedzee is giving me another chance to present my Carbon Capture machine. At his office in just a few hours!
translation.es: El Sr. Magedzee quiere ver mi máquina.¡Debo ir a su oficina en unas horas!

translation.en: -Mr. Nkwashi said, "Right now." -[exclaims] And gave me an address.
translation.es: La reunión es ahora. Esta es la dirección.

translation.en: It's not at school. Where is this?
translation.es: No es en la escuela. ¿Dónde queda esto?

translation.en: So I guess I'm not the only one with detention.
translation.es: Supongo que no soy la única castigada.

translation.en: Yeah, you have the wrong girl. Me? Detention? Aweh. We don't mix.
translation.es: Sí, claro. Te equivocaste de chica.¿Yo? ¿Castigada? Por favor. Jamás.

translation.en: Me neither. I just moved here.
translation.es: Yo tampoco. Acabo de mudarme aquí.

translation.en: Oh. Hi. I'm Monde.
[Zee] Hey. Zee.
If we're not serving detention, why did Mr. Nkwashi send us here?
translation.es: Entonces,¿por qué nos llamó el Sr. Nkwashi?

translation.en: Because I asked him to. Oh! The Juice Ya Cheapa lady.
translation.es: - Porque yo se lo pedí.- ¡La señora de los jugos!

translation.en: Muli bwanji, girls.
[girls] Bwino bwanji, Gogo.
I am Mama K. This is Chomps.
translation.es: Soy Mama K. Él es Chompsie.

translation.en: -[bleats] -[Mama K] And you have arrived at my fruit and vegetable stand.
translation.es: Este es mi puesto de frutas y verduras.

translation.en: You four have been offered this great opportunity to give back to your community.
translation.es: Ustedes cuatro tendrán la oportunidadde ayudar a su comunidad.

translation.en: -Opportunity for free labor, ka. -[giggles]
You will save the world working here. Eh? Here?
Mm, Gogo. I have an important appointment this afternoon. From what time to what time are we saving the world?
translation.es: Gogo, tengo una cita importante hoy.¿En qué horario salvaremos al mundo?

translation.en: Right now. But not right here.
translation.es: Justo ahora. Pero no desde aquí.

translation.en: Come with me.
What's that story with the old lady luring kids with sweets?
translation.es: ¿Y la historia de la ancianaque atrae niños con dulces?

translation.en: She's like a little old gogo, ha. Totally harmless.
translation.es: Es una abuelita, una gogo. Es inofensiva.

translation.en: -Little old gogo? -Hmm. That's how people disappear.
[Mama K] Follow me, please.
Mama weh.
We are going to disappear. [yelps]
As you know, girls, mysterious tornados have been causing destruction across Lusaka.
translation.es: Como saben, esos tornados misteriososestán destruyendo Lusaka.

translation.en: But there is more to it than meets the eye.
translation.es: Pero esto no es lo que parece.

translation.en: Abeg. You're one of those conspiracy theorists with an underground bunker.
translation.es: Cielos, es una conspiranoicacon un búnker subterráneo.

translation.en: This is where you are going to save the world.
What?
-[Temwe] Are you serious? -[Komana] Ati, what?
So cool.
-What? -[bleats]
Wait, does Mr. Nkwashi know about this?
translation.es: Espere, ¿el señor Nkwashi sabe de esto?

translation.en: No. He just thinks you're volunteering at the stand above.
translation.es: ¡No! Cree que me ayudarán con el puesto.

translation.en: This is my little secret.
[Komana] What is this place?
Many years ago, I was part of a secret government agency, working in these very headquarters,
translation.es: Hace muchos años, trabajaba aquípara una agencia secreta del gobierno.

translation.en: fighting evil forces in our city. Sha! This gogo is lekker.
translation.es: - Luchaba contra las fuerzas del mal.- ¡Vaya! Esta gogo es genial.

translation.en: Eh, eh, eh. Did you just say evil forces? Evil how?
As I was saying,
translation.es: Como decía, esto no es lo que parece.

translation.en: things are not what they seem. T.O.M.I., pull up drone footage from yesterday.
translation.es: Como decía, esto no es lo que parece. - T.O.M.I., muestra los videos.- Cargando.

translation.en: Artificial intelligence.
Artificial boyfriend. [chuckles]
Ah. Technological Operations Management Interface. T.O.M.I.
translation.es: Es una interfaz de manejode operaciones tecnológicas.

translation.en: T.O.M.I., zoom in, please.
[T.O.M.I.] Zooming in.
Whoa, whoa, whoa. Is that a guy caught in the tornado?
translation.es: ¿Hay un hombre atrapado en el tornado?

translation.en: He's not caught in it. [beeping] -[Komana] Basa, he's controlling it.
translation.es: No está atrapado ahí.Chicas, ¡lo está controlando!

translation.en: [Mama K] Yes! The tornados are not a freak act of Mother Nature. They are an act of a supervillain.
translation.es: ¡Sí! Los tornados no son naturales.Los creó un supervillano.

translation.en: Supervillain?
Wait, wait, wait! How? Why?
I'm not sure yet. We need to find out and put a stop to him.
translation.es: No estoy segura.Debemos averiguarlo y detenerlo.

translation.en: We? Did you just say "we"? She just said "we."
Mm. That's what she said. We.
I have been observing you keenly for weeks. [chuckles]
[Temwe] Observing us? You mean like, stalking?
It's called gathering intelligence.
And based on what I've gathered,
it is clear that you are the elite super squad I need to help save Lusaka.
translation.es: son el superequipo de éliteque salvará a Lusaka.

translation.en: You mean, superheroes!
Uh, yeah. Okay. Superheroes.
And based on my astute observations, I have built super suits distinctive to each of you.
translation.es: Basándome en mis astutas observaciones,hice un traje especial para cada una.

translation.en: -[gasps] -What? This is so…
[Mama K] They've been designed to boost each of your natural abilities. They'll keep you safe and protect your identity.
translation.es: Potenciarán sus habilidades naturales,las protegerán y ocultarán su identidad.

translation.en: All this talk about a suit. So what's with the watch?
translation.es: Nos habla de un traje.¿Por qué nos dio un reloj?

translation.en: Can I get a "whoa"?
[girls] Whoa.
Oh! Sorry, Chomps!
[laughing] Oh, it happens.
Now, girls, it is extremely important that you keep your secret identities secret.
translation.es: Chicas, es muy importanteque mantengan su identidad en secreto.

translation.en: No one can know. -Not your sister. -[gasps] [Mama K] Not your father. Not your bestie friend.
translation.es: Nadie puede saberlo: ni tu hermanani tu padre ni tu mejor amigo.

translation.en: Not your vitumbuwa vendor. You know about Ba Saasa?
translation.es: - Ni el que vende vitumbuwa.- ¿Conoce a Ba Saasa?

translation.en: It is for their protection as much as yours. [girls] Yeah. Okay.
translation.es: - Es para protegerlos a ellos y a ustedes.- Bien.

translation.en: It has been 20 years since Lusaka needed a team of heroes.
translation.es: Hacía 20 años que Lusakano necesitaba un equipo de héroes.

translation.en: If we want our people to survive, they need a team they can depend on.
But why us, Mama K?
[chuckles] It's not every day a 60-year-old lady
translation.es: No todos los días una mujer de 60

translation.en: sees four young women running into danger, shwi! Without thinking of themselves.
translation.es: ve a cuatro jóvenes enfrentarse al peligrosin pensar en ellas mismas.

translation.en: But being a hero takes more than super strength suits and high-tech gear.
translation.es: Pero un héroeno es solo un traje y tecnología de punta.

translation.en: It takes character. Together,
translation.es: Debe tener carácter. Ustedes tienen las cualidadesque el equipo necesita.

translation.en: you possess the innate qualities this team requires.
translation.es: Ustedes tienen las cualidadesque el equipo necesita.

translation.en: Komana, K-Bongo, the lover of knowledge.
Zee, Za-Mpezi, fast like lightning.
translation.es: Zee, Za-Mpezi, rápida como un rayo.

translation.en: Monde, M-Kozo, the bringer of peace.
translation.es: Monde, M-Kozo, la que mantiene la paz.

translation.en: And Temwe, T-Mlilo, full of fire.
translation.es: Y Temwe, T-Mlilo,la de personalidad fogosa.

translation.en: Aww! I wanted to be T-Licious.
But T-Mlilo is awesome. Fiyah!
The mind, body, soul, and heart of our team.
translation.es: La mente, el cuerpo, el almay el corazón del equipo.

translation.en: Together, you are my Team 4.
-Okay! -So, is Team 4 ready to save Lusaka?
-Ya, ya, ya! -Yes, Mama K.
-Yes. Mm. -Yeah!
T-Mlilo in the byu byu!
Eh, byu byu? As in, building?
Eya boom! You got it, Mama K.
Za-Mpezi in the byu byu.
Me too! M-Kozo in the byu byu!
My appointment! I'm going to be late.
K-Bongo, wait!
-Are you in… -The byu byu?
-No. -[girls] What?
I need to get that scholarship from Mr. Magedzee.
translation.es: Necesito la beca del señor Magedzee.

translation.en: Mama K, I'm sorry.
Wait, ba jobee,
you are leaving all these nice, nice things for the ka scholarship?
My entire future depends on it.
translation.es: Todo mi futuro depende de eso.

translation.en: And my dad.
[sniffles] He's sick.
This is not how I'm going to save the world. I can't… I can't do it all.
translation.es: No salvaré al mundo de esta forma.No puedo hacerlo todo.

translation.en: -But-- -Ah, ah. Let her go.
The water may be boiling on the stove, but no one can force you to pour in the mealie meal.
translation.es: Aunque el agua esté hirviendo,no pueden obligarte a cocinar.

translation.en: You have to be hungry.
So, T-Mlilo's Team 3! -[bleats] -How does everyone feel about that?
translation.es: Bueno, ¡somos las Super-3 de T-Mlilo!¿Qué les parece?

translation.en: [Mama K] Ah! What is happening, T.O.M.I.?
-[girls] Oh ,no! -Girls, it's Go Go time!
[Komana] Thank you for letting me present my project to you.
[Mr. Magedzee] Of course, Komana. We can't let a tornado get in the way of science, can we?
translation.es: Por supuesto, Komana.No dejaremos que un tornado nos detenga.

translation.en: No, sir.
This is my solar-powered Carbon Capture machine.
My machine doesn't just capture carbon.
It uses electricity generated from solar panels
to split CO2 into energized carbon monoxide and oxygen.
translation.es: para dividir el CO₂en monóxido de carbono y oxígeno.

translation.en: Once carbon monoxide is released, it's combined with hydrogen
translation.es: Al liberar el monóxido, se combina con hidrógenopara producir combustibles sintéticos.

translation.en: to produce safe, synthetic carbon-based fuels.
translation.es: se combina con hidrógenopara producir combustibles sintéticos.

translation.en: Uh-huh. So we can purify dangerous CO2 from the atmosphere while producing clean fuel and oxygen at the other end.
translation.es: Sirve para purificar el peligroso CO₂,y producir oxígeno y combustible limpio.

translation.en: It's brilliant. How did you choose solar as your power source?
Well, I looked into a number of energy resources.
Geothermal, wind, even an extremely rare mineral called Zambianite.
translation.es: Geotermia, viento,hasta un mineral escaso llamado zambinita.

translation.en: Ah, yes, I've heard of that mineral.
translation.es: Sí, he oído hablar de él.

translation.en: But ultimately, in Lusaka, the sun was the most reliable.
translation.es: Pero, en Lusaka,el sol es lo más confiable.

translation.en: Very true. And why a portable version of the Carbon Capture machine?
translation.es: Cierto. ¿Y por qué hicisteuna versión portátil?

translation.en: My dad developed breathing problems from the pollution, and other people might be suffering the same way.
translation.es: Mi papá tiene problemas respiratoriosy no debe ser el único.

translation.en: That's what I love! Technology made to benefit the lives of others.
translation.es: Me encanta la tecnologíaque mejora la vida de la gente.

translation.en: Astounding, Komana! I am impressed!
While we have a few candidates left to interview, I can tell you that you are in the top running.
translation.es: Si bien no terminé con las entrevistas,puedo decir que estás entre los mejores.

translation.en: -[people screaming] -We'll have the final results soon.
translation.es: Si bien no terminé con las entrevistas,puedo decir que estás entre los mejores. Pronto tendré el resultado.

translation.en: [gasps] Dad! Um, Mr. Magedzee, I have to go. Thank you, sir.
Thank you for…
coming, Komana.
Ta? Ninzi?
-Komana. -Ta? Are you okay?
I'm here, I'm here.
[Komana] Help! Help!
-Did you hear that? -Look, over there!
Imwe, tiyeni!
-[grunting] -Komana! I need help!
Whati?
Huh. Well. That's new.
Ta!
Komana… You know these girls?
Get him in the van. I'll take him to hospital.
Komana. Thank you, daughter.
-Ta. -[coughing]
-You saved my dad's life. -[Mama K] Don't worry, Komana. He's going to be fine.
translation.es: - Le salvaron la vida a mi papá.- Tranquila. Estará bien.

translation.en: Mama K, I can save the world in different ways. I see that now.
translation.es: Mama K., puedo salvar al mundode diferentes maneras. Ahora lo veo.

translation.en: -Is it too late to… -[chuckles]
Suit up!
Yah!
Bantu banga, we need to get to whoever is inside controlling this!
T-Mlilo! Let's use your ribbon, like you did with Mr. Nkwashi.
translation.es: Usa tu cinta, como hiciste con Nkwashi.

translation.en: Great idea. [grunts]
Are you hurt? Just my pride. And my butt.
translation.es: - ¿Te lastimaste algo?- Solo mi orgullo. Y el trasero.

translation.en: We got him!
What do we do?
What is that?
It's a brazier!
Look at you, K-Bongo!
Breaking up that tornado's cold air with a firebomb. Genius, ekse. Genius.
translation.es: Cortaste el aire frío del tornadocon una bomba. Qué genialidad, amiga.

translation.en: All this trouble has been caused by some old man.
translation.es: Y todo esto fue culpa de un viejo.

translation.en: Old?! Old?!
I am Storm Drain.
Creator of chaos!
-King of climate! -[beeping]
[chuckles] I will not be defeated!
Looks like you just were, Grandpa. I can't believe we pulled that off.
translation.es: - Acabamos de hacerlo, abuelo.- No puedo creerlo, lo logramos.

translation.en: [Mama K] Job well done! Congratulations, Team 4!
[Geoffrey] The public was pleasantly surprised when a group of heroes calling themselves Team 4
translation.es: Todos se sorprendieroncuando el grupo de heroínas Super-4

translation.en: finally put an end to the natural disaster that was not so natural after all.
translation.es: acabó con el desastre naturalque no era tan natural.

translation.en: So, who are these heroes, and where do they come from?
translation.es: ¿Quiénes son esas heroínasy de dónde vienen?

translation.en: Perhaps our pleas for help have finally been answered.
Be careful, Lusaka.
Those pleas will soon be drowned out by my power.
translation.es: Sus plegarias pronto serán inútilesfrente a mi poder.
